page.title: 10The People
page.content: Many of the inhabitants are retired. Quite a lot work on the land or have work associated with agriculture such as repairing farm machinery,making and selling machinery. The rest of the people follow a wide variety of occupations including employment in the boot & shoe trade, insurance, the professions, shops and offices. These people commute to Northampton, Bedford,Rushden and Wellingborough. Some travel to other parts of Britain and Europe. A few women are employed locally at the garden centre in Podington and at Hinwick Hall. There appears to be little unemployment. Nearly all the people said they liked living in the area because of the peace and quiet away from hustle and bustle, the rural atmosphere, the friendliness and the community spirit.
